name: Tuk Tuk Taxi
description:
Tuk Tuk Taxi is an exciting game that lets you experience the thrill of being a tuk tuk driver in a bustling city.

As a member of a taxi company, you'll be tasked with picking up customers who want to reach their destination quickly and comfortably while enjoying the open air. As you start the game, you'll be given a map of the city, and you'll need to navigate your tuk tuk through the busy streets to pick up your passengers. Once you've collected your fare, it's up to you to get them to their destination as quickly and safely as possible.

You'll need to be aware of the traffic and pedestrians around you as you make your way through the city. Make sure to follow traffic laws and avoid accidents to keep your passengers happy and earn more money.

With its simple and intuitive gameplay, Tuk Tuk Taxi is a game that can be enjoyed by anyone. Whether you're a casual gamer or a die-hard fan of driving games, Tuk Tuk Taxi is sure to keep you entertained for hours. So, buckle up, grab your helmet, and get ready to take on the streets of the city in the ultimate tuk tuk driving adventure!

Game Features :
- 2 Game Modes ( Free and Levels)
- Limited time
- 5 types of tuk tuks
